text: @CashApp Hi recently got into a car wreck and had my spleen removed and have absolutely no immune system. I am being forced to work in a Covid-19 heavy area and i work at Walmart. I have a 1 year old baby and i am terrified to work. This would mean so much. My cashapp is $Wearablebelt
